articles.description: New MMO Lost Ark is the second most-played game on Steam ever after just one weekend, but long login queues have beset the European launch
articles.content:

articles.description: The Kremlin signalled Monday it is ready to keep talking with the West about security grievances that led to the current Ukraine crisis, offering hope that Russia might not invade its beleaguered neighbor within days as the U.S. and Europe increasingly fear.
